lead_paragraph: The special board of arbitration appointed by the President to settle the issue in the captive coal mines consists in effect of one man -- John R. Steelman. Each of the other two members, Mr. Lewis and Mr. Fairless, is a direct participant in the dispute. Mr. Lewis's decision is certainly known in advance: it will be for the closed shop.
